metadata.apiml.service.description: The OPS/MVS REST API is a collection of web service endpoints that provides                                                                                                                                                                                                                          access to data elements managed by OPS/MVS. These elements include data from                                                                                                                                                                                                                         OPSLOG records, AOF rules and SSM resources.

These elements include data from                                                                                                                                                                                                                         OPSLOG records, AOF rules and SSM resources.
